price: (Yewe Muhamadi! Ntuzibwire ko kugera ku ntsinzi byoroshye, kuko n’Intumwa zakubanjirije zitayigezeho ako kanya, ahubwo) izo Ntumwa zageraga aho ziheba zigakeka ko zahakanywe burundu; icyo gihe inkunga yacu ikaba ari bwo izigeraho, maze tukarokora abo dushaka. Kandi ibihano byacu ntibikumirwa ku bantu b’inkozi z’ibibi.
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا ٱسۡتَيۡـَٔسَ ٱلرُّسُلُ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ قَدۡ كُذِبُواْ جَآءَهُمۡ نَصۡرُنَا فَنُجِّيَ مَن نَّشَآءُۖ وَلَا يُرَدُّ بَأۡسُنَا عَنِ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā is'tayasa al-rusulu waẓannū annahum qad kudhibū jāahum naṣrunā fanujjiya man nashāu walā yuraddu basunā ʿani al-qawmi al-muj'rimīna
